name: Office Accounting Company Backup File
summary: Learn about .SBB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SBB files are used to protect company data, send information to accountants, and move accounting data between computers.
NOTE: Microsoft stopped development for Accounting Office in 2009.

description: Company accounting database backup created by Microsoft Office Accounting, an online banking application for businesses; contains an uncompressed backup of a .SBD accounting database file; generated automatically when upgrading Office Accounting software.
